name: Danby DAC15009EE High Efficiency 15,000-BTU Room Window Air Conditioner
categoryPath: Home Improvement/Heating, Cooling, & Air Quality/Air Conditioners

reviews.name: Danby DAC15009EE High Efficiency 15,000-BTU Room Window Air Conditioner
reviews.reviewText:
When I ordered this air conditioner I was a little worried at how I was going to install a 100lb+ AC unit in my window. Danby really put some thought into the product design and made it so that you did all of the mounting work with just the exterior housing of the AC unit and then slid the heavy interior into the housing on rails. Great design for install.

It is doing a great job of cooling our upstairs space and I would recommend this unit to anyone with a large space to cool. It also comes with a 2 year onsite parts and labor warranty, This is a great AC unit.
reviews.title: Quality product that installs and works well

reviews.name: Danby DAC15009EE High Efficiency 15,000-BTU Room Window Air Conditioner
reviews.reviewText: We couldn't get the unit out of the frame so we had to install the whole heavy unit. I have a framed window so the brackets were too short but that would be the case for any normal brackets. I bought this one because it required the narrowest opening and we still couldn't put the sides on with my unique casements. But it is a great value for a 15K BTU AC!
reviews.title: Compact but powerful!

reviews.name: Danby DAC15009EE High Efficiency 15,000-BTU Room Window Air Conditioner
reviews.reviewText: this cools the whole downstairs of the apartment very happy with it
reviews.title: great for cooling

reviews.name: Danby DAC15009EE High Efficiency 15,000-BTU Room Window Air Conditioner
reviews.reviewText: Works great, keeps the house nice and cool, and not just the living room!!! Great ac for a great price!!
reviews.title: Nice n cool!!

reviews.name: Danby DAC15009EE High Efficiency 15,000-BTU Room Window Air Conditioner
reviews.title: It has been working great for 2 months now.
